Name: Azure Sky
About the game: Azure Sky is an action, puzzle and platform game. You need to take on the role of a young man, who will later gain power over his consciousness and learn to master magical abilities. On the way you will meet many dangerous creatures and unknown worlds in this fantastic world, but you will also find new friends and mentors in your small but interesting adventure! The game is a battle against the forces of evil, as a result of which you must win and master incredible abilities.
Meta Title: Azure Sky: Jan 25, 2021, Enoops and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Azure Sky? Check out the release date (Jan 25, 2021), developer insights from Enoops, and a complete game summary.
